verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> [our] <S%G80>brother,<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is at <S%G2882>Corinth<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> who are <S%G3650>throughout<s%> Achaia: <S%G882><s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> [be] the <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G3628>mercies<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3874>comfort;<s%>

who <S%G3870>comforts<s%> us in <S%G3956>all<s%> our <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that we may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are in <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> with the <S%G3874>comfort<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G846>ourselves<s%> are <S%G3870>comforted<s%> by <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G2531>just<s%> as the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> are <S%G1473>ours<s%> in <S%G4052>abundance,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G3874>comfort<s%> is <S%G4052>abundant<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But <S%G1535>if<s%> we are <S%G2346>afflicted,<s%> it is for your <S%G3874>comfort<s%> and <S%G4991>salvation;<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1535>if<s%> we are <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> it is for your <S%G3874>comfort,<s%> which is <S%G1754>effective<s%> in the <S%G5281>patient<s%> <S%G5281>enduring<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer;<s%>

and our <S%G1680>hope<s%> for you is <S%G949>firmly<s%> <S%G949>grounded,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that as you are <S%G2844>sharers<s%> of our <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> you are [sharers] of our <S%G3874>comfort.<s%>

For we do not <S%G2309>want<s%> you to be <S%G50>unaware,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> of our <S%G2347>affliction<s%> which <S%G1096>came<s%> [to us] in <S%G773>Asia,<s%> that we were <S%G916>burdened<s%> <S%G2596>excessively,<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> our <S%G1411>strength,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that we <S%G1820>despaired<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> of <S%G2198>life;<s%>

<S%G235>indeed,<s%> we <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G610>sentence<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that we should not <S%G3982>trust<s%> in <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> but in <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G1453>raises<s%> the <S%G3498>dead;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> us from <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G5082>great<s%> a [peril of] <S%G2288>death,<s%> and will <S%G4506>deliver<s%> [us,] He on <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G1679>set<s%> our <S%G1679>hope.<s%> And He will <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4506>deliver<s%> us,

you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4943>joining<s%> in <S%G4943>helping<s%> us through your <S%G1162>prayers,<s%> that <S%G2168>thanks<s%> may be <S%G2168>given<s%> by <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4383>persons<s%> on our <S%G5228>behalf<s%> for the <S%G5486>favor<s%> <S%G1519>bestowed<s%> upon us <S%G1223>through<s%> [the prayers of] <S%G4183>many.<s%>

For our <S%G2746>proud<s%> <S%G2746>confidence<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of our <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> that in <S%G41>holiness<s%> and <S%G2316>godly<s%> <S%G1505>sincerity,<s%> not in <S%G4559>fleshly<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> but in the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> we have <S%G390>conducted<s%> ourselves in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G4053>especially<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> you.

For we <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G243>else<s%> to you <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G314>read<s%> and <S%G1921>understand,<s%> and I <S%G1679>hope<s%> you will <S%G1921>understand<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5056>end;<s%>

<S%G2531>just<s%> as you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3313>partially<s%> did <S%G1921>understand<s%> us, that we are your <S%G2745>reason<s%> to be <S%G2745>proud<s%> as you <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G1473>ours,<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> I <S%G1014>intended<s%> at <S%G4387>first<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, that you might <S%G1208>twice<s%> <S%G2192>receive<s%> a <S%G5485>blessing;<s%>

that is, to <S%G1330>pass<s%> your <S%G1223>way<s%> into <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> and <S%G3825>again<s%> from <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, and by you to be <S%G4311>helped<s%> on my <S%G4311>journey<s%> to <S%G2453>Judea.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> I was not <S%G5530>vacillating<s%> <S%G1644><s%> when I <S%G1014>intended<s%> to do <S%G3778>this,<s%> was I? <S%G2228>Or<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1011>purpose,<s%> do I <S%G1011>purpose<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> that with me there should be <S%G3483>yes,<s%> <S%G3483>yes<s%> and <S%G3756>no,<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> [at the same time]?
But as <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> our <S%G3056>word<s%> to you is not <S%G3483>yes<s%> and <S%G3756>no.<s%>

For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who was <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you by us – by me and <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> – was not <S%G3483>yes<s%> and <S%G3756>no,<s%> but is <S%G3483>yes<s%> in Him.

For as <S%G3745>many<s%> as may be the <S%G1860>promises<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> in Him they are <S%G3483>yes;<s%> <S%G1352>wherefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> by Him is our <S%G281>Amen<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> us.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> He who <S%G950>establishes<s%> us with you in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and <S%G5548>anointed<s%> us is <S%G2316>God,<s%>
who <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4972>sealed<s%> us and <S%G1325>gave<s%> [us] the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> as a <S%G728>pledge.<s%>
But I <S%G1941>call<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> as <S%G3144>witness<s%> to my <S%G5590>soul,<s%> that to <S%G5339>spare<s%> you I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> to <S%G2882>Corinth.<s%>

Not that we <S%G2961>lord<s%> it <S%G2961>over<s%> your <S%G4102>faith,<s%> but are <S%G4904>workers<s%> with you for your <S%G5479>joy;<s%> for in your <S%G4102>faith<s%> you are <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G2476>firm.<s%>
